title: Petition so that Mulan's "Be a Man" song plays on a loop whenever Xin Zhao is out of combat.
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eGMN-gNfdaY

It's been 7 years since Xin Zhao was first released, and since day one, people have been requesting that this happen. Please Riot, do this!

replies.body:
Let's get down the midlane
To defeat... nexus
Did they send me Bronzes
When I asked... for Plat

You're the noobest bunch I ever met
But you can bet before we're through
Mister I'll... Make a Gold... Out of you

Tranquill as Maokai
But with Ignite... within
Once you find your OTP
You are sure... to win

You're a skilles, dumb, pathetic kidos
And you haven't got a clue
Somehow I... will gladly... Carry you

I'm never gonna catch Singed
Say "report my team" to all chat
Boy was I fool at start for skipping tutorial

This guy's gonna report them all
Hope leaverbuster will not ban me
Now I really wish that I knew how to farm

Be Master
You must be swift as a Singed with Ghost-Boots
Be Master
With mechanics of the great Gosu
Be Master
With all the strength of full AD Kha'Zix
Mysterious as unwarded side of jungleeeeee

Time is racing toward us
'Til Trynda... backdoors
Build at least once Zhonyas
And you might... survive

You're unsuited for the Gold elo
So sell skin, uninstall LOL, you're noob
How could I... make a Gold... out of you.

Read this while listening to the actual song

Legit the best thing I've seen all day.

God Bless you, dank memer

I swear to God, I was singing this while scrolling down so i'm in the same boat as you.

Thank you memers for making my day exciting.

Send this to Instalok.

They'll gladly make this, LOL
I just had to sing along as I read it.

Only for the Secret Agent XIn Zhao skin

http://i.imgur.com/Iy7zNEd.jpg
I also believe that the theme from Indiana Jones should play whenever Ezrael is running from Malphite.
While we are on the topic of Ezreal.. Could we get [this](https://youtu.be/5cFKFFKyLrw?t=51s) to play when Taric uses Bastion (W) on Ezreal for the first time ?
I actually sing that to my friends all the time XD They have no clue where I got it from or why I sing it. I can't believe that's the clip you picked XD

{{champion:40}} Why the heck did you jump in 1v5?

{{champion:5}} It's the only way to make the music stop.

MAKE IT STOP PLEASE

*dies*
*out of combat*
*music*

Some otherworldly voice: Your sacrifice was in vain.
"Your sacrifice was like Vayne's" FTFY
Logged in to upvote that
HOLY MOLY i was at the office while reading that and i laughed my as off :'D thats absolut NSFW
Same. Im getting looks because im crying. completely unexpected.
Can relate, I loudly exhaled through my nose and now my classmates are hanging me
Copyright

Give the revenue from all Xin Zhao skins to Disney and call it a day.

WE FUCKING NEED THE SONG!

Shhhh...

Don't spoil the dream...

Pfft!

Another one wanting to dumb down the game.

Right now you gotta go to youtube and turn the song yourself and it seperates great Xins from good ones. Or if you are a dedicated main you have the song downloaded - it shows real devotion to the champion.
**_REAL_** Xin Main here. I've put the files to the song into the Client's files and it now replaces the base song on Summoner's Rift and Twisted Treeline. Fuck ARAM tho.
When you get your 3rd party ban, that's what it's gonna be for. Just an fyi
That's what I call real dedication. I hope you sing along to it?
What? Is it possible to NOT sing along to the song? Why nobody ever told me that?!
Or if Riot ever adds songs for getting pentakills: This one has to be for Xin
Unlike many bot laners, I fully support this.
its at that point you never see a xin gank again
Should play globally when he is on a killing spree imo
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ycbK2REik14
I love this.
shouldn't it play when he's in combat? (xin secretly a girl?)

mulan doesnt sing the song. the soldier that trains her and then falls in love with her does. the only part that mulan sings is when the recruits start whining and it's only one line. the idea is that everyone that xin zhao faces is getting taught how to fight and told to be a man about it.

> [{quoted}](name=BLACK REALM GOD,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RujWUjQJ,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2017-02-15T05:35:12.393+0000)
>
> mulan doesnt sing the song. the soldier that trains her and then falls in love with her does. the only part that mulan sings is when the recruits start whining and it's only one line. the idea is that everyone that xin zhao faces is getting taught how to fight and told to be a man about it.

It's referring to the movie Mulan, not the girl.

> [{quoted}](name=Wind Birb,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RujWUjQJ,comment-id=000900000000,timestamp=2017-02-15T10:53:05.199+0000)
>
> It's referring to the movie Mulan, not the girl.


im not sure what you're correcting me about. (xin is secretly a girl?) is what i was commenting on because i thought the person above me was asking if xin is secretly a girl since the mulan song is about a girl. i've never seen the tooltip that the person below mentioned that says he is a girl. if that's true then... dang they need a new voice actress that sounds like ezreal pretending to be garen.
Actually, Xin really is a girl secretly. There's a tooltip about it in load screen. WHY WON'T IT READ?!?!!?!

i miss the old days in league its not even as exciting as when i started i remember the bit rush login with arcade miss fortune sona and riven i was soo hyped back then now this game is just nothing to  me i miss 2015
Now welcome to ADC 2017.
